name: .MEPX File Extension
summary: Learn about .MEPX files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open MEPX files with Movavi Video Editor and Movavi Video Suite. To open an MEPX file in either application, select File â†’ Open Project... from the menu bar. Then, locate and open your MEPX file.
You can export MEPX files with Movavi Video Editor or Video Suite to various video formats, such as .MP4, .AVI, and .MOV. To export an MEPX file, select Export.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
